field.name: summary
field.value: Allow use of C5 collections in place of Systems.Collection

field.name: description
field.value:
If you are using the C5 collections collection you have to manually replace the "using System.Collections.Generic;" line with "using C5".
Add another actiw field Collection Assembly (default it to System.Collections.Generic) that can then be changed as required.
For quick overview of C5 if aren't familiar with it.
http://tinyurl.com/2w6fno
